scripts.setup: cd server && yarn --silent --ignore-scripts --immutable --emoji && cd .. && cd client && yarn --emoji --silent --ignore-scripts --emoji --immutable
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && yarn dev" "cd client && yarn dev"
scripts.format: cd server && yarn format && cd .. && cd client && yarn format
scripts.lint: cd server && yarn lint && cd .. && cd client && yarn lint
scripts.ci: cd server && yarn build && yarn lint && cd .. && cd client && yarn build && yarn test && yarn lint
scripts.clear: rimraf node_modules dist build && cd server && rimraf node_modules dist build && cd .. && cd client && rimraf node_modules dist build
scripts.fetch-changes: git fetch && git fetch --prune && git pull
